error.400.title: 400 - Bad request
error.400.message: The server could not understand the request. Please try going back and trying again.
error.401.title: 401 - Unauthorized
error.401.message: You are not authorized to view this page. Please log in and try again.
error.404.title: 404 - Not found
error.404.message: The page you are looking for does not exist. Please check the URL and try again.

email.reset.title: Reset your password
email.reset.subtitle: Your reset link is:
email.reset.footnote: Someone requested a password reset on smallbites using your email address (%s). If this wasn't you, ignore this email. If it was you, click on the link to reset your password. This link will expire in an hour.
email.verify.title: Verify your email
email.verify.subtitle: Your verification link is:
email.verify.footnote: Someone registered an account on smallbites using your email address (%s) as %s. If this wasn't you, ignore this email. If it was you, click on the link to verify your account. This code will expire in an hour.
